item.title: Undergraduate Internship and Research Opportunities
item.description: We’ve assembled a list of undergraduate opportunities we’re aware of in HPC, computational science, or data science. This list is certainly not complete, so if you know of additional opportunities, please email us at chair at sighpcedu dot com and we’ll add it here! Program: Michigan State REU: Advanced Computational Research Experience Location: East Lansing, MI Dates: May 20 - July 26, 2024. Eligiblity: U.S. Citizen or permanent resident. Applications Due: February 29, 2024.
